awd_titl_txt: Presidential Awards for Excellence in Science, Mathematics  and Engineering Mentoring.
awd_abstract_narration: Dr. Castillo-Chavez is a Professor of Biometrics and Chair of the  Biometrics Unit at Cornell University.  He is recognized as a  researcher, dedicated teacher and mentor.  Dr. Castillo-Chavez has  amassed an outstanding record of achievement over a ten-year period  including the following:         Strong letters of support attesting to his success in helping       students succeed.         Seeking and receiving substantial grant support for mentoring       programs.         Internationally known researcher, who serves as a role model       for aspiring Latin scientists.         Numerous honors and awards, both National and International,       for his work in science.         Serving on the Boards of Directors , Society for the       Advancement of Chicanos and Native Americans in Science and       the Society for Mathematical Biology.         Involving many students in research at the undergraduate and       graduate level.

inst.inst_name: Cornell Univ - State: AWDS MADE PRIOR MAY 2010
